# Glossary

Canonical terms used throughout the rulebook.

<!-- Generated by glossary/build_glossary.js. Do not edit directly. -->

<a id="action-points-ap"></a>Action Points (AP)
: The 4-point action budget used each combat turn.

<a id="attribute"></a>Attribute
: One of Vigor, Dexterity, Mind, or Spirit.

<a id="augmented"></a>Augmented
: Major advantage; roll 3d10 and keep the highest 2.

<a id="bane"></a>Bane
: A minor disadvantage, usually -2.

<a id="base-die"></a>Base Die
: The non-story d10 in a Skill Check.

<a id="colonist"></a>Colonist
: A player character.

<a id="edge"></a>Edge
: A minor advantage, usually +2.

<a id="impaired"></a>Impaired
: Major disadvantage; roll 3d10 and keep the lowest 2.

<a id="inspiration-point"></a>Inspiration Point
: A point spent to reroll, add a die, or reduce Stress.

<a id="mental-break"></a>Mental Break
: A consequence of high Stress resolved by a Panic Check.

<a id="panic-check"></a>Panic Check
: 1d6 + Current Stress, used to resolve Mental Breaks.

<a id="quadrum"></a>Quadrum
: One of four 15-day seasons.

<a id="range-band"></a>Range Band
: Melee, Close, Medium, or Far.

<a id="skill-check"></a>Skill Check
: Base Die + Story Die + Attribute + Skill Modifier.

<a id="skill-modifier"></a>Skill Modifier
: Floor(Skill Points / 10).

<a id="story-die"></a>Story Die
: The red d10 that creates Twists or Complications.

<a id="storyteller-st"></a>Storyteller (ST)
: The GM role that runs the world and adversaries.

<a id="stress"></a>Stress
: Accumulated pressure from needs and events.

<a id="tier-of-success"></a>Tier of Success
: The result band: Struggle, Success, or Triumph.

<a id="twist-of-fate"></a>Twist of Fate
: Positive Story Die effect when the Story Die shows 1.
